name: Mind Your Step
description:
Note: The game takes a couple of seconds to load, but the screen is black during. Don't leave, the game works.
Note: Fast forward does not seem to work i Web-Build, sorry if the game feels a bit slow.

How to play:

The goal of the game is to get the pieces to thte tile of matching color Click on a piece to select it, and use the menu to give it orders to execute.

When you click play the orders are executed in rounds. For example: On round 4 the blue piece       executes it's 4th order, then the red piece       executes it's 4th order, then the green piece       and lastly the purple piece.

Two piece can be joined together, which is indicated by a symbol       above their head. If a piece is joined, the joined piece will execute the same order at the same time (although they are not shown on the joined pieces order of list)

Every level has a number of minimum rounds to reach the goals, but as long as the goals are reached the level is considered completed.

This is my entry to the GMTK GameJam 2021.

I'm solodev, and this is my first isometric game as well as game with more focus on art. If you have feedback I'd love to receive it in the comments!
